person.note: Tian(1) Wan [23032] See documentation in 1148 jinshi list, sanjia #12, for great grandson, Xingzong [23035]. Xingzong is not listed as a 1148 jinshi in either the Zhejiang TZ, or the Lishui XZ, and the family may have moved here. There are no Tian(1) at all listed as Lishui jinshi, but Chuzhou, Jinyun county lists a Tian(1) Cai (not in dataset) (wood radical) as a 1151 jinshi and Tian(1) Wei (not in dataset) (water radical) as a 1160 jinshi. The generational indicators are not shared by Tian(1) Xingzong's patrilineal ancestors. Cai and Wei are the first Tian jinshi listed in Zhejiang TZ, and this may indicate the emergence from low station of an indigenous Tian family or immigation from the North. Zhejiang TZ, 125.16a, 23b.
